posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark Morris
Looking to complete my Sacramento team of 1910 Obaks 175 Series. Want to buy: Briggs, Fournier, Hunt, Perry, Raymer & Whalen. Also interested in any Obak or Zeenut cards of Spider Baum, my great-grandfather, who played for Sacramento and other PCL teams. Please email prices and scans to mmorris@sacbee.com.
